category_depth.label: Visible menu depth
category_depth.comment: e.g. 1, 2, 3, 4. For example, if you set this value to 2, only second level categories will be displayed

float_header.label: Float Header
float_header.comment: Effect only in "Home Page" which contains an available Revolution Slider above, and use logo small is logo primary

aspect_ratio.label: Keep Image Aspect Ratio
aspect_ratio.comment: Set "Yes", to keep aspect ratio of the product images (height of the images will be calculated automatically based on width).

alt_image_effect.label: Alternative Image Effect
alt_image_effect.comment: Show alternative image on mouse hover over the main image.

alt_image_column.label: Select Alt. Image By Column
alt_image_column.comment: Which column of the product image gallery will mark alternative images of your products.

alt_image_column_value.label: Alt. Image Column Value
alt_image_column_value.comment: Specify the value which will mark alternative images of your products. E.g.: if Select Alt. Image By Column is set to "Sort Order", specify the number which will mark (in "Sort Order" column of the product image gallery) alternative images, for example: "2".

image_width.label: Image Width
image_width.comment: Set width image in page products list.

image_height.label: Image Height
image_height.comment: Set height image in page products list.

zoom_width.label: Zoom Width
zoom_width.comment: If 'auto' is specified, the width will be the same as the small image.

zoom_height.label: Zoom Height
zoom_height.comment: If 'auto' is specified, the height will be the same as the small image.

smooth_move.label: Smooth Move
smooth_move.comment: The higher the number, the smoother/more drifty the movement will be. 1 = no smoothing.

lens_opacity.label: Lens Opacity
lens_opacity.comment: Where 0 is fully transparent, and 1 is fully opaque.

title_opacity.label: Title Opacity
title_opacity.comment: Where 0 is fully transparent, and 1 is fully opaque.

slides_to_scroll.label: The number of items to scroll by

install.label: Theme Installation
install.comment:
IMPORTANT:
in case you need the original content of some static blocks or pages
XML files with all static blocks and pages can be found in the following directory:
app/code/local/ARW/Sebian/etc/import/

import_blocks.label: Static Blocks
import_blocks.comment: Click this button to create all static blocks provided with this theme.

overwrite_blocks.label: Overwrite Existing Blocks
overwrite_blocks.comment: If set to "Yes", imported blocks will overwrite existing blocks with the same identifiers (if any blocks with the same identifiers already exist). To change value of this field, save the configuration (without saving, the option will remain unchanged after you refresh the page).

import_pages.label: Pages
import_pages.comment: Click this button to create CMS pages provided with this theme.

overwrite_pages.label: Overwrite Existing Pages
overwrite_pages.comment: If set to "Yes", imported pages will overwrite existing pages with the same identifiers (if any pages with the same identifiers already exist). To change value of this field, save the configuration (without saving, the option will remain unchanged after you refresh the page).

custom_css.label: Load Custom CSS
custom_css.comment: Enable this option to load "custom.css" file in which you can override the default styling of the theme. To create "custom.css" you can use the file "SAMPLE.custom.css" which is located in skin/frontend/arw_sebian/default/css directory.

font_size.label: Basic Font Size
font_size.comment: Size of the regular text. Font size of most of the other elements will be calculated relative to this value.

primary_font_family_group.label: Font Family
primary_font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

primary_font_family_custom.label: Custom
primary_font_family_custom.comment:
Type in your custom font stack, e.g.:
Arial, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif Important: Do not add trailing semicolon.

primary_font_family.label: Font Family - Google Fonts
primary_font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

primary_google_font_charsets.label: Choose the character sets you want:
primary_google_font_charsets.comment: Only selected fonts support extended character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets please refer to Google Web Fonts.

primary_google_font_variants.label: Choose the variants sets you want:
primary_google_font_variants.comment: Only selected fonts support extended variants sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets please refer to Google Web Fonts.

heading_font_family_group.label: Heading Font Family
heading_font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

heading_font_family_custom.label: Heading Font Custom
heading_font_family_custom.comment:
Type in your custom font stack, e.g.:
Arial, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif Important: Do not add trailing semicolon.

heading_font_family.label: Heading Font Family - Google Fonts
heading_font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

heading_google_font_charsets.label: Choose the character sets you want:
heading_google_font_charsets.comment: Only selected fonts support extended character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets please refer to Google Web Fonts.

heading_google_font_variants.label: Choose the variants sets you want:
heading_google_font_variants.comment: Only selected fonts support extended variants sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets please refer to Google Web Fonts.

highlight_font_family_group.label: Highlight Font Family
highlight_font_family_group.comment: Select predefined font stack, Google Fonts or type in your custom font stack.

highlight_font_family_custom.label: Highlight Font Custom
highlight_font_family_custom.comment:
Type in your custom font stack, e.g.:
Arial, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif Important: Do not add trailing semicolon.

highlight_font_family.label: Highlight Font Family - Google Fonts
highlight_font_family.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

highlight_google_font_charsets.label: Choose the character sets you want:
highlight_google_font_charsets.comment: Only selected fonts support extended character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets please refer to Google Web Fonts.

highlight_google_font_variants.label: Choose the variants sets you want:
highlight_google_font_variants.comment: Only selected fonts support extended variants sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets please refer to Google Web Fonts.

header_bg_opacity.label: Header Background Opacity
header_bg_opacity.comment: Where 0 is fully transparent, and 100 is fully opaque. it's apply for only Sticky Navigation on Home Page

header_bg_position_custom.label: Header Background Position Custom
header_bg_position_custom.comment: The first value is the horizontal position and the second value is the vertical. The top left corner is 0 0. Units can be pixels (0px 0px) or any other CSS units. If you only specify one value, the other value will be 50%. You can mix % and positions

header_dropdown_link_hover_bg.label: Header Dropdown Link Hover Background Color

sticky_header_opacity.label: Sticky Header Background Opacity
sticky_header_opacity.comment: Where 0 is fully transparent, and 100 is fully opaque. it's apply for only Sticky Navigation on Home Page

level1_hover_bg.label: Menu Item Lv1 Hover Background Color

level2_hover_bg.label: Menu Item Lv2 Hover Background Color

level3_hover_bg.label: Menu Item Lv3 Hover Background Color

body_bg_position_custom.label: Body Background Position Custom
body_bg_position_custom.comment: The first value is the horizontal position and the second value is the vertical. The top left corner is 0 0. Units can be pixels (0px 0px) or any other CSS units. If you only specify one value, the other value will be 50%. You can mix % and positions

main_bg_position_custom.label: Main Background Position Custom
main_bg_position_custom.comment: The first value is the horizontal position and the second value is the vertical. The top left corner is 0 0. Units can be pixels (0px 0px) or any other CSS units. If you only specify one value, the other value will be 50%. You can mix % and positions

footer_bg_position_custom.label: Footer Background Position Custom
footer_bg_position_custom.comment: The first value is the horizontal position and the second value is the vertical. The top left corner is 0 0. Units can be pixels (0px 0px) or any other CSS units. If you only specify one value, the other value will be 50%. You can mix % and positions

custom_width.label: Custom Maximum Content Page Width (px)
custom_width.comment: Specify value in pixels, do not add "px" suffix. Range: 960-3000
